=== Forethought precedence/chaining sanity ===

# Mix GEK with nested statements to ensure we parse GE/GA/GO/GU uniformly
ge mi klama gi ge do tavla gi ti citka
---
(source_file (forethought (ge) (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (brivla))) (gi) (statement (forethought (ge) (statement (sumti (do)) (selbri (brivla))) (gi) (statement (sumti (ti)) (selbri (brivla)))))))

# Alternate starters
ga mi klama gi go do tavla gi tu citka
---
(source_file (forethought (ga) (statement (sumti (mi)) (selbri (brivla))) (gi) (statement (forethought (go) (statement (sumti (do)) (selbri (brivla))) (gi) (statement (sumti (tu)) (selbri (brivla)))))))
